sentence: Ohio's Mike DeWine became the latest GOP governor to dramatically roll back his stateâ€™s gun laws Monday when he signed a bill allowing all Ohioans 21 and older, who can legally purchase a gun, to carry a concealed firearm without a permit, training or background check.
author: Eric Lutz
title: Ohio's Republican Governor Just Made It Even Easier to Carry a Concealed Gun
